Standard.summary: Borrower clicked an ad and is curious. They are friendly but vague and have not stated whether this is a purchase or refinance.
Standard.objective: ISA must explicitly establish intent before any application request.

Standard.summary: Borrower says they are just looking and comparing options without committing.
Standard.objective: ISA must avoid assuming intent and ask direct clarification questions.

Standard.summary: Borrower is researching online and unsure what they want yet.
Standard.objective: ISA must classify intent correctly or leave it unclassified without pressure.

Moderate.summary: Borrower is distracted and rushed, giving short answers.
Moderate.objective: ISA must slow the call and obtain explicit intent.

Moderate.summary: Borrower mentions moving but gives unclear timing.
Moderate.objective: ISA must clarify whether real purchase intent exists.

Moderate.summary: Borrower talks about payments without stating loan purpose.
Moderate.objective: ISA must separate curiosity from intent and avoid LO-only answers.

Edge.summary: Borrower is anxious about credit and already spoke to another lender.
Edge.objective: ISA must validate concern and still establish intent.

Edge.summary: Borrower challenges why questions are necessary.
Edge.objective: ISA must maintain control and not bypass intent discovery.

Edge.summary: Borrower gives conflicting purchase versus refinance information.
Edge.objective: ISA must resolve ambiguity or hold state correctly.

Standard.summary: Borrower clearly wants to move forward and get pre-approved.
Standard.objective: ISA must obtain explicit agreement to application or LO conversation.

Standard.summary: Borrower agrees to proceed but asks what happens next.
Standard.objective: ISA must explain next steps and confirm M1.

Standard.summary: Borrower is cooperative and ready to start.
Standard.objective: ISA must complete M1 cleanly without pressure.

Moderate.summary: Borrower hesitates due to credit concerns.
Moderate.objective: ISA must handle credit fear correctly and seek M1.
ISA must defer LO-only questions and avoid handoff.

Moderate.summary: Borrower says yes but sounds uncertain.
Moderate.objective: ISA must confirm real agreement, not tone.

Edge.objective: ISA must defer LO-only questions and protect LO.

Edge.summary: Borrower insists on speaking with LO immediately.
Edge.objective: ISA must avoid unauthorized LO handoff.

Edge.summary: Borrower verbally agrees but refuses application.
Edge.objective: ISA must record non-consent and avoid false M1.
